kun reading compounds: 吊る【つる】to hang, to suspend, to sling, to wear (e.g. a sword), to put up (e.g. a shelf), to hang oneself, to hoist an opponent off of his feet by his loincloth, to turn upwards (as if being pulled), to be slanted (of eyes), to pucker (e.g. of a seam), to be pulled tight
吊るす【つるす】to hang, to hang up
吊るす【つるす】to hang, to hang up
